title: Stock market ends week on a mixed note
body_lines: The Colombo stock market today failed to close on a convincing note as indices moved different directions amidst moderate turnover.
The active S&PSL20 declined by over 15 points or 0.6% whilst the benchmark ASPI gained by nearly 13 points or 0.17%. The mixed performance comes after two days of emphatic gains.
Turnover today was Rs. 2.5 billion, marginally down from Rs. 3 billion on Thursday.
